titles.title: There Is Power In the Blood

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: There is pow'r, pow'r,

Wonder working pow'r
in the blood of the Lamb

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: There is pow'r, pow'r,

Wonder working pow'r
in the precious blood of the Lamb

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Would you be free
from the burden of sin?

There's pow'r in the blood
pow'r in the blood

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Would you o'er evil a victory win?

There's wonderful pow'r
in the blood

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Would you be free
from your passion and pride?

There's pow'r in the blood
pow'r in the blood

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Come for a cleansing
to Calvary's tide;

There's wonderful pow'r
in the blood

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Would you be whiter,
much whiter than snow?

There's pow'r in the blood
pow'r in the blood

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Sin stains are lost
and it's life giving flow,

There's wonderful pow'r
in the blood

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Would you do service
for Jesus your King?

There's pow'r in the blood
pow'r in the blood

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Would you live daily
His praises to sing?

There's wonderful pow'r
in the blood
